# Task Ledger Entry (Template)

- Date: YYYY-MM-DD
- Milestone: M0|M1|M2|M3|M4|M5|M6
- Task/Issue ID (optional): #
- Title: <concise summary>
- Owner: <name>

## Summary

What changed and why, at a high level.

## Changes

- Key code/docs touched
- Tests/metrics updated

## Follow-ups

- Next tasks or risks to track
